Convert an array to a tensor.

@description

# Examples
```{r}
x <- array(c(1, 2, 3))
y <- convert_to_tensor(x)
y
```

@returns
A tensor of the specified `dtype`.

@param x An array.
@param dtype The target type.

@export
@family ops
@seealso 
  + [k_array()]
  + <https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/ops/convert_to_tensor>
